Script.name: WoWI Cleanup
Script.description: Removes the nasty Ogaming bar from the top of WoWInterface

Script.name: All Music Guide Corrector
Script.description: A port of Adrian Holovaty's All Music Guide site-specific extension

Script.name: Popup Window Fixer
Script.description: Fixes poorly written javascript popup windows in the manner specified by http://youngpup.net/2003/popups.

Script.name: Netvibes Subscribe
Script.description: Adds links to subscribe to site feeds via Netvibes

Script.name: 30Boxes text size-fixer
Script.description: fixes the text size on your 30boxes.com calendar to be less... huge.

Script.name: SourceForge - Cleaner Layout
Script.description: Removes the right sidebar and adverts

Script.name: Slashdot - comment tree
Script.description: Allows you to collapse and expand comments

Script.name: Collapsible Amazon
Script.description: Collapse any section of the Amazon website by clicking on the orange section header.

Script.name: Mailman discard all
Script.description: Automatically selects the 'discard' radio button for all messages when doing mail moderation using Mailman on SourceForge.net
